patthana19.8:1.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:1.1_1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:1.1_2: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:2.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:2.1_1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:2.1_2: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.8:3.1_0: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.8:3.1_1: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.8:4.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
